attributes.action: allow Manchester Private Hire to pick up Disabled and Elderly customers in a Bus Lane
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently Manchester Council do not allow Private Hire Taxi drivers to use Bus Lanes to Pick and drop Disabled/Elderly customers - we feel this is blatent discrimination and we request everyone signs our petition which we plan to hand into the council in two weeks, please google my name derek brocklehurst to find the basis of our campaign. Other councils allow Private Hire (mini cab) to pick up and set down Disabled/Elderly customers Please help us to change their mind.

rejection.details: Please contact Manchester Council with your suggestion in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
